content:
167 explosions were recorded in the border areas and settlements of Sumy region.

About thisIn the evening of March 28 reportedSumy Regional Military Administration.

The shelling was suffered by Mykolaiv, Khotinskaya, Yunakovskaya, Belopilsk, Miropil, Krasnopil, Velikopysarivska, Putivl, Novoslobidskaya, Shaliginsk, Esmanskaya, Media-Budsk communities.

▪ Pubivl community: enemy beat mortars (3 explosions).

▪️ Velikospayar community: UAV shelling (FPV-Dron) (1 explosion), UAV shelling (Lancet type) (1 explosion), firing with RSSS (12 explosions).

▪️Krasnopil community: The explosive device (2 explosions) (2 explosions) was recorded from the UAV.

▪️USMAN community: Russians have struck a racket from the helicopter (6 explosions).

▪️ The Belopil community: the enemy beat from artillery (33 explosions), grenade launchers of AGS (15 explosions), mortars (8 explosions).

▪️ Novoslobida community: 9 mines dropped the Russians into the community.

▪️ Yuzakiv community: The explosive device (LOG) (4 explosions) was made from the UAV.

▪️Mikolaev community: Artillery shelling (5 explosions) and firing with RSSS (10 explosions) took place.

▪️Shaligyn community: the enemy beat from artillery (14 explosions) and mortars (2 explosions).

▪️Hotin community: Artillery shellings (19 explosions) have been recorded.

▪️Miropil community: UAVs (FPV-Dron) (2 explosions) and shelling (6 explosions) were carried out.

▪️Deault-Budsk community: UAV shelling (FPV-Dron) (2 explosions), racket shelling (6 explosions), mortar shelling (7 explosions) took place.

Asreported the armyinform, the enemy used the same managed ammunition in Donetsk region, which he beat Kharkiv yesterday.
title: In a day the enemy fired 28 times Sumy region
